original_text: From there they went in a ship back to Antioch. That was the place where the believers had chosen them to do God's work. They had asked God to help Paul and Barnabas in this work. Now Paul and Barnabas had finished this work and they had returned home.
korean_text: 거기서 배 타고 안디옥에 이르니 이 곳은 두 사도가 이룬 그 일을 위하여 전에 하나님의 은혜에 부탁하던 곳이라

sentences.original_text: From there they went in a ship
where the believers had chosen them
They had asked God to help Paul and Barnabas
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님께 바울과 바나바를 도와달라고 요청했습니다

sentences.original_text: Now Paul and Barnabas had finished this work
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 바울과 바나바는 이 일을 마쳤습니다
